docs.snippet: Soccer is a universal language during the World Cup. But increasing numbers of non-Spanish-speakers say they watch the games on Spanish-language television for the colorful commentary....
docs.lead_paragraph: Soccer is a universal language during the World Cup. But increasing numbers of non-Spanish-speakers say they watch the games on Spanish-language television for the colorful commentary.

headline.print_headline: Dave Grohl Brings Rock n' Roll Touch to TV Tour
headline.main: Dave Grohl Brings Rock n' Roll Touch to TV Tour

headline.print_headline: Argentina's Di Maria Trains in Hope of Making Final
headline.main: Argentina's Di Maria Trains in Hope of Making Final

docs.snippet: Argentina winger Angel Di Maria trained lightly on Thursday in the hope of being able to play a part in the World Cup final against Germany on Sunday despite suffering a thigh injury just days ago....
docs.lead_paragraph: Argentina winger Angel Di Maria trained lightly on Thursday in the hope of being able to play a part in the World Cup final against Germany on Sunday despite suffering a thigh injury just days ago.

headline.print_headline: Church of England Severs Ties With Payday Lender Wonga
headline.main: Church of England Severs Ties With Payday Lender Wonga

docs.snippet: The Church of England has sold its indirect stake in Wonga, ending its association with the high-interest online lender that came under scrutiny for sending customers bogus letters....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Church of England has sold its indirect stake in Wonga, ending its association with the high-interest online lender that came under scrutiny for sending customers bogus letters.

headline.print_headline: Biden, Ukraine Leader Discuss Cease-Fire Efforts
headline.main: Biden, Ukraine Leader Discuss Cease-Fire Efforts

docs.snippet: Ukrainian President Petro Poroshenko has told Vice President Joe Biden that Ukraine's offers for cease-fire talks were all rejected by either Russia or pro-Russian separatists....

headline.print_headline: Mayweather Set for Maidana Re-Match in September
headline.main: Mayweather Set for Maidana Re-Match in September

headline.print_headline: Supporters Optimistic After Ex-U.S. Marine Appears in Mexico Court
headline.main: Supporters Optimistic After Ex-U.S. Marine Appears in Mexico Court

docs.snippet: Supporters of a former U.S. Marine held for more than three months in a Mexican jail on weapons charges said on Thursday they were encouraged by his first court appearance and were hopeful he would be home soon....
docs.lead_paragraph: Supporters of a former U.S. Marine held for more than three months in a Mexican jail on weapons charges said on Thursday they were encouraged by his first court appearance and were hopeful he would be home soon.

headline.print_headline: Florida Man Executed for 1994 Rape and Murder of Girl
headline.main: Florida Man Executed for 1994 Rape and Murder of Girl

docs.snippet: A man who confessed to the rape and murder of an 11-year-old girl was executed by lethal injection on Thursday, the Florida Department of Corrections said....
docs.lead_paragraph: A man who confessed to the rape and murder of an 11-year-old girl was executed by lethal injection on Thursday, the Florida Department of Corrections said.

headline.print_headline: Crime Spree Helps Pakistani Taliban Squirrel Away Cash Before Raids Begin
headline.main: Crime Spree Helps Pakistani Taliban Squirrel Away Cash Before Raids Begin

docs.snippet: In the months before Pakistan jets began pounding Taliban hideouts in the lawless border region near Afghanistan, militants were busily conducting an unprecedented wave of kidnapping and extortion, stockpiling cash for the fight ahead....
docs.lead_paragraph: In the months before Pakistan jets began pounding Taliban hideouts in the lawless border region near Afghanistan, militants were busily conducting an unprecedented wave of kidnapping and extortion, stockpiling cash for the fight ahead.
